RelatedSentence: YEREVAN - Armenian Volunteer Corps ( AVC ) launches its Voluntourism summer program with the Southern Discovery tour set for July 18 to 29 .

A combination of travel and service , participants will visit historic sites , enjoy the natural beauty of Armenia , and also give something back by volunteering with local organizations and communities .

With 14 years experience coordinating volunteer placements and community service projects with hundreds of partners throughout Armenia , AVC has selected locations and service opportunities that support grassroots development with a view to encouraging sustainable impact .

You 'll explore cultural and natural sites in Ararat , Vayots Dzor and Syunik ; work side-by-side with local farmers , helping the villagers bundle their wholesome bounty to market .
You 'll explore cultural and natural sites in Ararat , Vayots Dzor and Syunik ; work side-by-side with local farmers , helping the villagers bundle their wholesome bounty to market .

You will ride the world 's longest aerial tram ; learn how to make traditional lavash and collect honey ; and see where the world 's oldest leather shoe and winepress were discovered - all while enjoying hiking , horseback - riding , off - roading and wine - tasting .
You will also experience rural life through village homestays and work with local residents in their community .

A0: leading volunteer organization based in Armenia
RelatedSentence: Armenian Volunteer Corps is Armenia 's leading volunteer organization based in Armenia , customizing job placements for some 550 global volunteers aged 21 and up and working to create a connection between people around the world and Armenia .
AVC volunteers have hailed from the four corners of the world - 35 countries to date .
